title: Fairy Tale Chronicles - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Sci-fi
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Alchemy   Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Cooking   Couple Growth   Crafting   Demons   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple POV   Multiple Transported Individuals   Otaku   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Polygamy   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Royalty   Slow Romance   Sword And Magic   Technological Gap   Transported into a Game World
author: Haniwaseijin   埴輪星人
description:
Azuma Hiroshi, a good-for-nothing man, and Toudou Haruna, a beautiful woman are caught up in a malicious game bug.

They are stuck inside a VRMMO game world and left penniless, starting without a bag and only their beginners kit.

「What is happening……？」「What should I do……？」

Hiroshi has a phobia with women and whilst he was thrown into this game-like world, it was most definitely a completely different world.

This is a story of their adventure, looking for a way to return to his original world.>
